fields.Title: KIM SWITCH / DESERTER TACTICS
fields.Description: Kim talks to you on the side and says you got him, push motive angle.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ballistics. Let him cook here for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ballistics. Let him cook here for a minute or two -- we can have another look at the set-up he had there, with the mattress." He nods southeast to the tower. "Ballistics always impresses these military types."

fields.Title: You: ""Do you think he did it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you think he did it?"

fields.Title: You: ""I'm trying to get him to confess...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm trying to get him to confess..."

fields.Title: Drama: "Yes, sire! Make a production of thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, sire! Make a production of this examination!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good." He nods. "We're doing very..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good." He nods. "We're doing very good. He *wants* to confess -- I can see that. We just need to pile it on, a little more -- the more we have on him, the closer he is..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Remember," the lieutenant whispers..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Remember," the lieutenant whispers. "He wants to tell us -- but he doesn't want to *help* us. It needs to look like we already have everything."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He smiles. "You should be proud. Co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He smiles. "You should be proud. Come on -- let's wrap this up."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ballistics. Let him cook here for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ballistics. Let him cook here for a minute or two -- we can have another look around the island for a sniper's nest." He looks to the small tower on the coast. "I think we should check out the post."

fields.Title: Logic: "You hear that? He thinks you're *th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You hear that? He thinks you're *this* close...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, good going -- that should be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, good going -- that should be our *first* priority."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can see that, yes. I'm not judgi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can see that, yes. I'm not judging."

fields.Title: You: ""We really did, didn't we?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "We really did, didn't we?"

fields.Title: Suggestion: "It doesn't have to hold in court. J..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It doesn't have to hold in court. Just establish a line of sight and he'll do the rest himself.

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, let's do this." (Conclude.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, let's do this." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, I can think of one thing. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, I can think of one thing. The gun." He smiles very politely. "We should pick it up, and discuss it in front of him. Make a show of it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Remember," the lieutenant whispers..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Remember," the lieutenant whispers. "He wants to tell us -- but he doesn't want to *help* us. It needs to look like we already have everything."

fields.Title: You: ""You think he has more? Than this c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You think he has more? Than this case?"

fields.Title: You: ""How do you think the questioning i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How do you think the questioning is going?"

fields.Title: You: ""What can I put on him -- to get hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What can I put on him -- to get him to fess up?"

fields.Title: You: "Pat him on the back. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Pat him on the back. [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""What am I missing? What haven't I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What am I missing? What haven't I done?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We just need to get him back to th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We just need to get him back to the mainland." A crooked little smile. "We actually did it..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Also, the gun." He smiles very pol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Also, the gun." He smiles very politely. "We should pick it up and discuss it in front of him. Make a show of it."

fields.Title: You: ""Let's get him back before we congr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's get him back before we congratulate ourselves."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He's a communard. The victim was a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He's a communard. The victim was a mercenary. We should get him talking politics again. You could even tell him we already *have* a motive."
fields.Alternate1: "He's a communard. The victim was a mercenary. From Oranje. If everything else fails, get him talking politics... You could even tell him we already *have* a motive."

fields.Title: Empathy: "There is palpable excitement in his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is palpable excitement in his tone. He likes him for this -- *a lot*. But there's something more too...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh yes..." He nods. "And -- he has..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh yes..." He nods. "And -- he hasn't spoken to anybody in a long time. If we get him open, who knows what will pour out..."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm slapping myself to get ideas!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm slapping myself to get ideas!"

fields.Title: Logic: "He thinks the deserter has more tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He thinks the deserter has more than just this case in him. Forty-four years here...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. "From nothing to this in a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He nods. "From nothing to this in a day..." A crooked little smile. "This is *good*, we just need a confession first, and then *maybe* a solid motive later."
fields.Alternate1: He nods. "From nothing to this in a day..." A crooked little smile. "This is *good*, lieutenant-yefreitor, we just need a confession first, and then *maybe* a solid motive later."
fields.Alternate2: He nods. "From nothing to this in a day..." A crooked little smile. "This is *good*, Detective Du Bois, we just need a confession first, and then *maybe* a solid motive later."
